paper_abstract: Let k(r)(n, delta) be the minimum number of r=cliques in graphs with n vertices and minimum degree at least delta. We evaluate k(r)(n, delta) for delta <= 4n/5 and some other cases. Moreover, we give a construction which we conjecture to give all extremal graphs (subject to certain conditions on n, delta and r).
paper_title: Cliques in Graphs With Bounded Minimum Degree
